## Optimal (fast) velocity profiles for racing applications
### OCP-like precision for real-time applications

![](data/GIGI/blockdiagramFinal_exported_tikz_new.png){width=70% fig-align="center"}

:::{.columns}
:::: {.column width="60%"}
:::{.tbbox}
::: {.titlebox}
GIGI - Forward Backward algorithm
:::
- Forward Backward algorithm for velocity profile optimization
- Generic convex and non-convex GGV constraints
- Real-time capable (ms computation time)
- Close approximation to OCP solutions
:::
